title: Geometric series
definition: Geometric series are of the form \(z_n=r a^n\) with \(r,a\) constants.
sum:
We have \(S_n=\sum\limits_{k=0}^{n}r a^k\).
Multiplying by \(a\) and using the distributive law: \[a S_n=\sum\limits_{k=0}^{n}r a^{k+1}\]
We notice that this series includes all the terms of \(S_n\) except for the \(k=0\) term, \(r\). We also have an extra term, \(r a^{n+1}\): \[a S_n=S_n +r a^{n+1} -r\]
Solving and simplifying: \[S_n=r \frac{a^{n+1} -1}{a-1} \]
